title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB:
When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content: 
1) HTML text within <html... </html> tag. 
2) HTML fragments not within <html> tag. 
3) Text with RTF tags, the dynamic text content type has no effect. The field is displayed as plain text regardless of the content type.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Set up a database field with the three types of content mentioned above.
2. Add a dynamic text element to display the contents of the field.
3. Observe that the dynamic text content type does not have any effect and the field is always displayed as plain text.
